Hagelslag
=========
Hagelslag is a modular, scalable Python library for feature- and grid-based data analysis of weather data. The primary
features of general interest are modules for identifying and tracking features in gridded data and modules for
calculating common meteorological verification statistics for deterministic and probabilistic forecasts.
